title: Look Who's Talking
summary: After a single, career-minded woman is left on her own to give birth to the child of a married man, she finds a new romantic chance in a cab driver. Meanwhile, the point-of-view of the newborn boy is narrated through voice-over.

title: Driving Miss Daisy
summary: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

title: Turner & Hooch
summary: Det. Scott Turner (Tom Hanks) is an uptight, by-the-book police officer. When his friend Amos Reed (John McIntire), the proprietor of a junkyard, is killed, Turner reluctantly inherits the man's dog. Turner adjusts to life with the dog to help solve a murder case.

title: Born on the Fourth of July
summary: The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for.

title: Field of Dreams
summary: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the 1919 Chicago White Sox come.

title: Uncle Buck
summary: Bachelor and all-round slob Buck babysits his brothers rebellious teenage daughter and her cute younger brother and sister.

title: When Harry Met Sally...
summary: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

title: Dead Poets Society
summary: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to look at poetry with a different perspective of authentic knowledge and feelings.

title: Parenthood
summary: The Buckmans are a midwestern family all dealing with their lives: estranged relatives, raising children, pressures of the job, and learning to be a good parent and spouse.

title: Lethal Weapon 2
summary: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

title: The War of the Roses
summary: A married couple try everything to get each other to leave the house in a vicious divorce battle.

title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
summary: The Griswold familys plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
summary: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

title: Batman
summary: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.

title: Ghostbusters II
summary: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

title: The Little Mermaid
summary: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a princes love.

title: Back to the Future Part II
summary: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
summary: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry Indiana Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitlers Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

title: Tango & Cash
summary: Framed by their ruthless arch-nemesis, a mismatched LAPD crime-fighting duo has to put its differences aside to even the score with the evil kingpin who put them behind bars once and for all.

title: Steel Magnolias
summary: A young beautician, newly arrived in a small Louisiana town, finds work at the local salon, where a small group of women share a close bond of friendship, and welcome her into the fold.

title: Three Men and a Little Lady
summary: Sequel to Three Men and a Baby (1987), Mary starts school. Actress mom is now living in the apartment in NYC with the biological dad and 2 honorary dads, who are still actor, architect and cartoonist. Mom's English boyfriend proposes.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
summary: Four teenage mutant ninja turtles emerge from the shadows to protect New York City from a gang of criminal ninjas.

title: Pretty Woman
summary: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.

title: Kindergarten Cop
summary: A tough cop must pose as a kindergarten teacher in order to locate a dangerous criminals ex-wife, who may hold the key to putting him behind bars.

title: Home Alone
summary: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

title: Bird on a Wire
summary: An old flame discovers her ex-boyfriend from the past is a relocated FBI informant out to stop the bad guys.

title: Misery
summary: After a famous author is rescued from a car crash by a fan of his novels, he comes to realize that the care he is receiving is only the beginning of a nightmare of captivity and abuse.

title: Edward Scissorhands
summary: An artificial man, who was incompletely constructed and has scissors for hands, leads a solitary life. Then one day, a suburban lady meets him and introduces him to her world.

title: Ghost
summary: After a young man is murdered, his spirit stays behind to warn his lover of impending danger, with the help of a reluctant psychic.

title: Presumed Innocent
summary: As a lawyer investigates the murder of a colleague, he finds himself more connected to the crime than anyone else.

title: Dances with Wolves
summary: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

title: Flatliners
summary: Five medical students experiment with near death experiences, until the dark consequences of past tragedies begin to jeopardize their lives.

title: The Hunt for Red October
summary: In November 1984, the Soviet Unions best submarine Captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the U.S. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

title: Another 48 Hrs.
summary: Jack Cates once again enlists the aid of ex-con Reggie Hammond--this time, to take down The Iceman, a ruthless drug lord operating in the San Francisco bay area.

title: Back to the Future Part III
summary: Learning about the death of Doc Brown in 1885, Marty travels back in time to save him. But when the fuel tank on the time machine is punctured, the two must figure out a way to escape the Old West before Emmet is murdered.

title: Dick Tracy
summary: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprices united mob.

title: The Godfather: Part III
summary: In the midst of trying to legitimize his business dealings in New York City and Italy in 1979, aging Mafia Don Michael Corleone seeks to avow for his sins, while taking his nephew Vincent Mancini under his wing.

title: Days of Thunder
summary: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

title: Total Recall
summary: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

title: Die Hard 2
summary: John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

title: Fried Green Tomatoes
summary: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
summary: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: Sleeping with the Enemy
summary: A young woman fakes her own death in an attempt to escape her nightmarish marriage, but discovers it is impossible to elude her controlling husband.

title: Father of the Bride
summary: With his oldest daughters wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.

title: The Naked Gun 2 1/2: The Smell of Fear
summary: Lieutenant Frank Drebin discovers that his ex-girlfriend's new beau is involved in a plot to kidnap a scientist who advocates solar energy.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II
summary: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last canister of the ooze that created the Turtles, with which Shredder wants to unleash an army of new mutants.

title: Beauty and the Beast
summary: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young womans love.

title: Hot Shots!
summary: A parody of Top Gun (1986) in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission sabotaged by greedy weapons manufacturers.

title: City Slickers
summary: On the verge of turning 40, an unhappy Manhattan yuppie is roped into joining his two friends on a cattle drive in the southwest.

title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
summary: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

title: The Addams Family
summary: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

title: The Prince of Tides
summary: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sisters psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.

title: What About Bob?
summary: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

title: Cape Fear
summary: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

title: JFK
summary: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers theres more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
summary: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

title: Hook
summary: When Captain Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

title: Backdraft
summary: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who dont get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
summary: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

title: The Crying Game
summary: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldiers world.

title: The Hand that Rocks the Cradle
summary: After her humiliated husband kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family.

title: Unforgiven
summary: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny (Clint Eastwood) reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan (Morgan Freeman) and a young man, The Schofield Kid (Jaimz Woolvett).

title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
summary: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

title: Wayne's World
summary: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

title: The Bodyguard
summary: A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to an RB singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a Presidents.

title: Aladdin
summary: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

title: White Men Can't Jump
summary: Black and white basketball hustlers join forces to double their chances of winning money on the street courts and in a basketball tournament.

title: Sister Act
summary: When a worldly singer witnesses a mob crime, the police hide her as a nun in a traditional convent where she has trouble fitting in.

title: Scent of a Woman
summary: A prep school student needing money agrees to babysit a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.

title: Lethal Weapon 3
summary: Martin Riggs and Roger Murtaugh pursue a former LAPD officer who uses his knowledge of police procedure and policies to steal and sell confiscated guns and ammunition to local street gangs.

title: Under Siege
summary: An ex-Navy Seal turned cook is the only person who can stop a group of terrorists when they seize control of a U.S. battleship.

title: Boomerang
summary: A successful executive and womanizer finds his lifestyle choices have turned back on him when his new female boss turns out to be an even bigger deviant than he is.

title: A League of Their Own
summary: Two sisters join the first female professional baseball league and struggle to help it succeed amidst their own growing rivalry.

title: The Last of the Mohicans
summary: Three trappers protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.

title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
summary: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harkers fianc�e Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

title: A Few Good Men
summary: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

title: Patriot Games
summary: When CIA analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

title: Basic Instinct
summary: A violent police detective investigates a brutal murder that might involve a manipulative and seductive novelist.

title: Batman Returns
summary: Batman returns to the big screen when a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaks havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman.

title: Cool Runnings
summary: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.

title: Groundhog Day
summary: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

title: Free Willy
summary: When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

title: Sleepless in Seattle
summary: A recently widowed mans son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

title: Schindler's List
summary: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: Mrs. Doubtfire
summary: After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.

title: Tombstone
summary: A successful lawmans plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

title: Philadelphia
summary: When a man with HIV is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic small time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.

title: Dave
summary: To avoid a potentially explosive scandal when the U.S. President goes into a coma, an affable temp agency owner with an uncanny resemblance is put in his place.

title: Grumpy Old Men
summary: A lifelong feud between two neighbors since childhood only gets worse when a new female neighbor moves across the street.

title: Indecent Proposal
summary: A billionaire offers one million dollars to a young married couple for one night with the wife.

title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
summary: Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.

title: In the Line of Fire
summary: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldnt save Kennedy, but hes determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

title: Rising Sun
summary: When an escort girl is found dead in the offices of a Japanese company in Los Angeles, detectives Web Smith and John Connor act as liaison between the companys executives and the investigating cop Tom Graham.

title: The Firm
summary: A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.

title: The Fugitive
summary: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

title: The Pelican Brief
summary: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

title: Demolition Man
summary: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

title: Cliffhanger
summary: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

title: Jurassic Park III
summary: A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Grant to go to Isla Sorna for a holiday, but their unexpected landing startles the island's new inhabitants.

title: Pulp Fiction
summary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
summary: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

title: Dumb and Dumber
summary: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen, to return the briefcase to its owner.

title: The Santa Clause
summary: When a man inadvertently makes Santa fall off of his roof on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

title: The Mask
summary: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

title: Speed
summary: A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

title: Legends of the Fall
summary: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

title: Star Trek: Generations
summary: With the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, Captain Picard must stop a deranged scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter a space matrix.

title: The Lion King
summary: A Lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his fathers death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

title: The Client
summary: A young boy who witnessed the suicide of a mafia lawyer hires an attorney to protect him when the District Attorney tries to use him to take down a mob family.

title: The Specialist
summary: A woman entices a bomb expert shes involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

title: The Flintstones
summary: In a parallel modern-day Stone Age world, a working-class family, the Flintstones, are set up for an executive job. But they learn that money cant buy happiness.

title: Forrest Gump
summary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: Stargate
summary: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

title: Disclosure
summary: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

title: Interview with the Vampire
summary: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

title: Clear and Present Danger
summary: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

title: Wolf
summary: Publisher Will Randall becomes a werewolf and has to fight to keep his job.

title: Maverick
summary: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

title: True Lies
summary: A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.

title: While You Were Sleeping
summary: A hopeless romantic Chicago Transit Authority token collector is mistaken for the fianc�e of a coma patient.

title: Dangerous Minds
summary: An ex-Marine turned teacher struggles to connect with her students in an inner city school.

title: Grumpier Old Men
summary: John and Max resolve to save their beloved bait shop from turning into an Italian restaurant, just as its new female owner catches Maxs attention.

title: Father of the Bride Part II
summary: George Banks must deal not only with the pregnancy of his daughter, but also with the unexpected pregnancy of his wife.

title: Toy Story
summary: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boys room.

title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
summary: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

title: Get Shorty
summary: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt, and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

title: Mr. Holland's Opus
summary: A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.

title: Se7en
summary: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: Casper
summary: An afterlife therapist and his daughter meet a friendly young ghost when they move into a crumbling mansion in order to rid the premises of wicked spirits.

title: Congo
summary: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

title: Apollo 13
summary: NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

title: Crimson Tide
summary: On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny, to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles, before confirming his orders to do so.

title: Pocahontas
summary: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth-century Virginia.

title: GoldenEye
summary: Years after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a secret space based weapons program known as Goldeneye is stolen. James Bond sets out to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using the weapon.

title: Jumanji
summary: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

title: Braveheart
summary: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

title: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
summary: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

title: Batman Forever
summary: Batman must battle former district attorney Harvey Dent, who is now Two-Face and Edward Nygma, The Riddler with help from an amorous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

title: Waterworld
summary: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw smokers, and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

title: Scream
summary: A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.

title: The First Wives Club
summary: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

title: The English Patient
summary: At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

title: The Birdcage
summary: A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fianc�es right-wing moralistic parents.

title: Phenomenon
summary: An ordinary man sees a bright light descend from the sky, and discovers he now has super-intelligence and telekinesis.

title: A Time to Kill
summary: In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his ten-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.

title: Star Trek: First Contact
summary: The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earths first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.

title: Broken Arrow
summary: Terrorists steal nuclear warheads from the U.S. military but dont count on a pilot and park ranger spoiling their plans.

title: Jerry Maguire
summary: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former secretary.

title: The Nutty Professor
summary: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

title: 101 Dalmatians
summary: An evil high-fashion designer plots to steal Dalmatian puppies in order to make an extravagant fur coat, but instead creates an extravagant mess.

title: The Rock
summary: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

title: Independence Day
summary: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankinds best weapon is the will to survive.

title: Mission: Impossible
summary: An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.

title: Ransom
summary: When a multimillionaire mans son is kidnapped, he cooperates with the police at first but then turns the tables on the kidnappers when he uses the ransom money as a reward for the capture of the kidnappers.

title: Space Jam
summary: In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.

title: Twister
summary: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
summary: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

title: Eraser
summary: A Witness Protection specialist becomes suspicious of his co-workers when dealing with a case involving high-tech weapons.

title: Michael
summary: Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that its true. But thats not the only surprise.

title: Good Will Hunting
summary: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
summary: Four young friends bound by a tragic accident are reunited when they find themselves being stalked by a hook-wielding maniac in their small seaside town.

title: Scream 2
summary: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sydney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

title: My Best Friend's Wedding
summary: When a womans long-time friend reveals hes engaged, she realizes she loves him herself and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

title: Liar Liar
summary: A fast-track lawyer cant lie for 24 hours due to his sons birthday wish after he disappoints his son for the last time.

title: As Good as It Gets
summary: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

title: George of the Jungle
summary: A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.

title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
summary: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there, while an InGen team approaches with another agenda.

title: Con Air
summary: Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

title: Conspiracy Theory
summary: A man obsessed with conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of his theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, in order to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

title: Face/Off
summary: In order to foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

title: Flubber
summary: An absent-minded professor discovers flubber, a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.

title: Hercules
summary: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

title: Air Force One
summary: Communist Radicals hijack Air Force One with The U.S. President and his family on board. The Vice President negotiates from Washington D.C., while the President, a Veteran, fights to rescue the hostages on board.

title: Men in Black
summary: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

title: Contact
summary: Dr. Ellie Arroway (Jodie Foster), after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

title: Tomorrow Never Dies
summary: James Bond heads to stop a media moguls plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

title: Batman and Robin
summary: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

title: Titanic
summary: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: There's Something About Mary
summary: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

title: The Waterboy
summary: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

title: Shakespeare in Love
summary: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

title: The Rugrats Movie
summary: Tommy, Chuckie, Phil and Lil gets lost in the forest after adopting a baby who has come to life.

title: Rush Hour
summary: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consuls kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

title: Stepmom
summary: A terminally-ill woman must deal with her ex-husbands new lover, who will be their childrens stepmother.

title: Patch Adams
summary: The true story of a heroic man, Hunter Patch Adams, determined to become a medical doctor because he enjoys helping people. He ventured where no doctor had ventured before, using humour and pathos.

title: The Truman Show
summary: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

title: You've Got Mail
summary: Two business rivals who despise each other in real life unwittingly fall in love over the Internet.

title: Saving Private Ryan
summary: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

title: The Prince of Egypt
summary: An Egyptian prince learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

title: Doctor Dolittle
summary: A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.

title: Deep Impact
summary: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive. Which people will survive?

title: Mulan
summary: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of Chinas greatest heroines in the process.

title: Enemy of the State
summary: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious politically motivated crime.

title: The Mask of Zorro
summary: A young thief (Antonio Banderas), seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro (Sir Anthony Hopkins), who also pursues vengeance of his own.

title: A Bug's Life
summary: A misfit ant, looking for warriors to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

title: Godzilla
summary: A giant, reptilian monster surfaces, leaving destruction in its wake as it strides into New York City. To stop it, an earthworm scientist, his reporter ex-girlfriend, and other unlikely heroes team up to save their city.

title: Armageddon
summary: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

title: Lethal Weapon 4
summary: With personal crises and age weighing in on them, LAPD officers Riggs and Murtaugh must contend with deadly Chinese triads that are trying to free their former leaders out of prison and onto American soil.

title: The Blair Witch Project
summary: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

title: American Pie
summary: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.
